name

public java.lang.String name
The name of this Metro area. Should take the form City 1-City 2-City 3, State 1-State 2-State 3

findByGeom

public static MetroArea findByGeom(double lat,
                                   double lon)
Find the metro area that contains the point given (in WGS84 coordinates). If more than one metro meets this criterion, one of them will be returned (no guarantee as to which one).

Parameters:
lat -
lon -
